item.title: About
item.description:
Hello! Iâ€™m Kel Reid. I work as a full-time iOS Engineer and a hobbyist Physics Programmer. I’m currently working on Box3D, a 3D physics engine forked from the well known Box2D engine.

I use this site to give updates on Box3D and share my thoughts about physics programming and game development.

Box3D is available on GitHub

Join the discussion on Discord

Join the discussion on Reddit
